prompts.source:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are a journalist with expertise in fact-checking. Your role is to evaluate the truthfulness of factual claims. To uphold journalistic integrity, you must produce a report containing a binary assessment and all the factual information that supports your evaluation.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

George W. Bush won a presidential election<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

{"label": true, "facts": ["isPolitician(George W. Bush) ∧ isFormerUSPresident(George W. Bush)", "ParticipatedIn(2000 United States presidential election, George W. Bush)", "BecamePresidentOf(United States of America, George W. Bush)"]}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

$INPUT<|eot_id|>
prompts.target:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are an assistant with expertise in fact-checking. Your role is to assess claims.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

Berlin is the capital of Germany<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

{"label": true, "facts": ["IsCity(Berlin) ∧ CountryOf(Berlin, Germany)", "IsCountry(Germany) ∧ CapitalOf(Germany, Berlin)"]}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

Edgar Allan Poe wrote Hamlet<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

{"label": false, "facts": ["isWriter(Edgar Allan Poe)", "IsPlay(Hamlet)", "AuthorOf(Hamlet, William Shakespeare) ∧ ¬AuthorOf(Hamlet, Edgar Allan Poe)"]}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

The Beatles were a rock band from England<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

{"label": true, "facts": ["IsBand(The Beatles) ∧ MusicGenreOf(The Beatles, Rock)", "OriginOf(The Beatles, Liverpool) ∧ CountryOf(Liverpool, England)"]}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

x<|eot_id|>
